{"step_by_step_thinking": "Cholesterol is a type of fat that is found in animal-based foods. It is not present in plant-based oils like coconut oil. Egg yolk is known to have a high content of cholesterol. Hydrogenated fat is a type of fat that is processed and often used in processed foods, and it can contribute to high cholesterol levels. Ghee is a type of clarified butter and it is high in saturated fat, which can also contribute to high cholesterol levels. Therefore, the correct answer is B. Egg yolk.", "answer_choice": "B"}
